headline: How The Amerant Bancorp (AMTB) Story Is Evolving With Leadership Change And Credit Questions
summary: Amerant Bancorp’s fair value estimate is held at US$24.50, even as analysts refine their models and reassess what the recent company updates mean for the stock. Recent research leans on modest price target adjustments that reflect how the bank is handling leadership changes and a closely watched credit profile, with both bullish and cautious voices highlighting different parts of the same story. As you read on, you will see how to track these evolving calls and what they might mean for your...
